response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and quality, it's worth more than $12,000 to us. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, we are offering it to you for $14,999. If you have any questions or would like to discuss further, please feel free to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14999}
